
# Properties for PROV was generated by (Schema)

`cdif.bbr.metadata.provProperties.generatedBy` *v0.1*

Schema defining properties for documenting hardware or software used in the creation of a dataset..

[*Status*](http://www.opengis.net/def/status): Under development

## Description

## PROV generated by properties

Defines a set of properties for specifying instruments or software used in the generation of  a described resource.  Uses terms from the base prov vocabulary. For the schema.org implementation of the [Cross Domain Interoperability Framework](https://cross-domain-interoperability-framework.github.io/cdifbook/metadata/schemaorgimplementation.html#implementation-of-metadata-content-items) (CDIF) discovery profile.
## Examples

### Example PROV was generated by.
very simple implementation for discovery-level representation of instruments or software used to generate a resource.
#### json
```json
{
    "@context": {
        "schema": "http://schema.org/",
        "prov": "http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#",
        "nerc": "https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/"
    },
    "@id": "ex:generatedBy_345y254h",
    "@type": "prov:Activity",
    "schema:name":"example generatedBy",
    "prov:used": [
        "nerc:collection/L05/current/134",
        "nerc:collection/B76/current/B7600031"
    ]
}
```

#### jsonld
```jsonld
{
  "@context": [
    {
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "prov": "http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#",
      "nerc": "https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/"
    },
    "https://smrgeoinfo.github.io/OCGbuildingBlockTest/build/annotated/bbr/metadata/provProperties/generatedBy/context.jsonld",
    {
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "prov": "http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#",
      "nerc": "https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/"
    }
  ],
  "@id": "ex:generatedBy_345y254h",
  "@type": "prov:Activity",
  "schema:name": "example generatedBy",
  "prov:used": [
    "nerc:collection/L05/current/134",
    "nerc:collection/B76/current/B7600031"
  ]
}
```

#### ttl
```ttl
@prefix prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#> .
@prefix schema1: <http://schema.org/> .

<ex:generatedBy_345y254h> a prov:Activity ;
    schema1:name "example generatedBy" ;
    prov:used "nerc:collection/B76/current/B7600031",
        "nerc:collection/L05/current/134" .


```

## Schema

```yaml
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
title: very simple links or names of software or instruments used to generate a resource.
type: object
properties:
  '@type':
    type: string
    const: prov:Activity
  prov:used:
    type: array
    items:
      anyOf:
      - type: string
      - type: object
        properties:
          '@id':
            type: string
            description: a resolvable reference to a representation of the software
              or instrument used
x-jsonld-prefixes:
  schema: http://schema.org/
  prov: http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#

```

Links to the schema:

* YAML version: [schema.yaml](https://smrgeoinfo.github.io/OCGbuildingBlockTest/build/annotated/bbr/metadata/provProperties/generatedBy/schema.json)
* JSON version: [schema.json](https://smrgeoinfo.github.io/OCGbuildingBlockTest/build/annotated/bbr/metadata/provProperties/generatedBy/schema.yaml)

```jsonld
{
  "@context": {
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "prov": "http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#",
    "@version": 1.1
  }
}
```

[context.jsonld](https://smrgeoinfo.github.io/OCGbuildingBlockTest/build/annotated/bbr/metadata/provProperties/generatedBy/context.jsonld)
